What are the treatments for Isobutyryl-CoA dehydrogenase deficiency ?,"How is isobutyryl-CoA dehydrogenase deficiency (IBD deficiency) treated? There is no standard treatment protocol for IBD deficiency. Infants diagnosed through newborn screen
